korean: 오늘 미세먼지 농도가 매우 나쁨이라서 마스크를 쓰고 나갔다.
아침에 미세먼지 앱 확인했는데 빨간색으로 표시되더라.
목도 칼칼하고 눈도 따갑고 진짜 최악이야.
공기청정기 필터 보니까 벌써 회색으로 변했어.
밖에 나갈 일이 있어서 KF94 마스크 꼭 쓰고 다녔다.
그래도 목이 아파서 약국에서 목캔디 샀어.
편의점 가는 것도 귀찮아서 배달 시켜먹었다.
뉴스에서 중국발 미세먼지라고 하던데 언제까지 이럴 건지 모르겠어.
내일은 비 온대. 비라도 와서 미세먼지 좀 씻어줬으면 좋겠다.
english: The fine dust level was very bad today, so I wore a mask when I went out.
I checked the air quality app this morning and it was, like, bright red.
The sky looked hazy and it made me feel gloomy.
My throat felt scratchy and my eyes were stinging. Honestly, it was the worst.
I couldn't even open the windows and just ran the air purifier.
I looked at the air purifier filter and it already turned gray.
I had to go out, so I made sure to wear a KF94 mask the whole time.
My throat was hurting anyway, so I bought some throat lozenges at the pharmacy.
I was too lazy to go to the convenience store, so I just ordered delivery.
It was a day when I missed clean air.
The news said it's fine dust from China, but I mean, who knows when this will end.
They say it's gonna rain tomorrow. I really hope the rain washes away this dust.
